TopicTitle: [DMP] Is it possible to increase the tick rate?

Articles.Content:
Hello, my friend and I were messing around with DMP again.  Our internets are better this time around, so we can actually get a somewhat stable connection sometimes.  However, we noticed the tick rates are very slow.  Is it possible to increase the tick rate?

 

Thanks,

Slntreaper

I assume you are talking about the DarkMultiPlayer mod.

I've never installed or played with it ever so can't help much. There is very basic documentation up on the mod author's GitHub. I suggest scrolling down and reading the README.md section and also the Wiki link on the toolbar.

You may find the info you are looking for there.
